languages.text: "Я также обязан передать вам вот это". {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет запечатанное письмо.{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор уточнил, что содержимое этого конверта предназначено только для ваших глаз. Прочтите его как только найдется время".

traits.locale_text: "Я также обязан передать вам вот это". {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет запечатанное письмо.{/n} "Лорд Инквизитор уточнил, что содержимое этого конверта предназначено только для ваших глаз. Прочтите его как только найдется время".

languages.text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."
languages.original_text: "Я также обязан передать вам вот это". {n}Хейнрикс извлекает на свет запечатанное письмо.{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор уточнил, что содержимое этого конверта предназначено только для ваших глаз. Прочтите его как только найдется время".

traits.locale_text: "I must also pass this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for yours eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

"I must also pass this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for yours eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

"I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

"I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

"I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

languages.text: 「それと、これもお渡ししたい」{n}ハインリックスは封がされた手紙を取り出した。{/n}「この手紙の中身はあなたの目にしか触れないようにと、ロード・インクィジターより仰せつかったもの。時間ができ次第、すぐに目を通していただきたい」
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: 「それと、これもお渡ししたい」{n}ハインリックスは封がされた手紙を取り出した。{/n}「この手紙の中身はあなたの目にしか触れないようにと、ロード・インクィジターより仰せつかったもの。時間ができ次第、すぐに目を通していただきたい」

languages.text: “这个东西也必须交给你。”{n}海因里希拿出一封带有蜡封的信件。{/n}“大审判官明确告诉我，信封里的内容只能由你过目。希望你有时间就立刻读一读里面的内容。”
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: “这个东西也必须交给你。”{n}海因里希拿出一封带有蜡封的信件。{/n}“审判长明确告诉我，信封里的内容只能由你过目。希望你有时间就立刻读一读里面的内容。”

languages.text: «También debo hacerle entrega de esto». {n}Heinrix saca una carta lacrada.{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor ha especificado que el contenido de este sobre solo puede verlo usted. Me gustaría que lo leyera en cuanto tuviera un hueco».
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: «También debo hacerle entrega de esto». {n}Heinrix saca una carta lacrada.{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor ha especificado que el contenido de este sobre solo puede verlo usted. Me gustaría que lo leyera en cuanto tuviera un hueco».

languages.text: « Je dois aussi vous remettre ceci, {n}ajoute-t-il en vous tendant une lettre scellée.{/n} Le seigneur inquisiteur a bien précisé que le contenu de cette enveloppe ne devait être vu que par vous et par vous {mf|seul|seule}. Je vous demanderai d'en prendre connaissance au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois aussi vous remettre ceci, {n}ajoute-t-il en vous tendant une lettre scellée.{/n} Le seigneur inquisiteur a bien précisé que le contenu de cette enveloppe ne devait être vu que par vous et par vous {mf|seul|seule}. Je vous demanderai d'en prendre connaissance au plus vite. »

languages.text: "Außerdem muss ich Euch das hier übergeben." {n}Heinrix zieht einen versiegelten Brief hervor.{/n} "Der Großinquisitor hat angeordnet, dass der Inhalt dieses Umschlags nur für Eure Augen bestimmt ist. Ich bitte Euch, ihn zu lesen, sobald Ihr Zeit dafür findet."
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem muss ich Euch das hier übergeben." {n}Heinrix zieht einen versiegelten Brief hervor.{/n} "Der Großinquisitor hat angeordnet, dass der Inhalt dieses Umschlags nur für Eure Augen bestimmt ist. Ich bitte Euch, ihn zu lesen, sobald Ihr Zeit dafür findet."

languages.text: "Sana bunu teslim etmeliyim." {n}Heinrix, mühürlü bir mektup çıkarıyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, bu zarfın içindekileri senden başkasının görmemesi gerektiğini belirtti. En kısa zamanda okumanı rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I must also deliver this to you." {n}Heinrix pulls out a sealed letter.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor specified that the contents of this envelope are for your eyes only. I would ask you to read it as soon as you have the time."

traits.locale_text: "Size bunu teslim etmeliyim." {n}Heinrix kapalı bir mektup çıkarıyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu bu zarfın içindekileri sadece sizin okumanız gerektiğini belirtti. En kısa zamanda okumanızı rica ediyorum."
